Entries.Crookshanks.DynamicSS_hayisforhorses/Saw:
marnieShop/-100 -100/farmer 6 18 3 Shane 24 15 0 Sterling -100 -100 0/addConversationTopic hayforhorses/viewport 15 18 clamp/skippable/pause 2000/playSound doorCreak/warp Sterling 13 19/faceDirection Sterling 0/textAboveHead Shane "Hey."/pause 2000/speak Sterling "Yeah, need some for the horse.$10"/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 500/emote Shane 12/advancedMove Shane false 0 2 -4 0 0 1 -5 0 0 -1 3 100/pause 500/speak Shane "Oh, it's you.$2"/pause 300/pause 1000/advancedMove Sterling false 0 -2 1 100/pause 3000/emote Sterling 60 true/pause 900/speak Sterling "Uh, yeah. I was just looking to pick up a couple things from Marnie.$3#$b# I'll come back around.$12"/faceDirection Sterling 2/pause 200/speak Shane "I can help you.#$b#I'm covering the shop for Marnie."/pause 500/faceDirection Sterling 1/speak Sterling "Oh.#$b#... Sure, thanks.$13"/advancedMove Shane false 0 -4 -2 0 0 1 -1 0 2 100/advancedMove Sterling false 0 1 -6 0 0 -3 4 1000/pause 2500/textAboveHead Sterling "Hey, sweetcheeks"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/waitForAllStationary/playSound grassyStep/pause 500/advancedMove Sterling false -3 0 2 1000/waitForAllStationary/playSound grassyStep/pause 500/advancedMove Sterling false 3 0 0 3 5 0 0 -2 4 100/waitForAllStationary/playSound select/pause 500/speak Sterling "So, you're working for Marnie now?"
                
                
                
                /speak Shane "...#$b#Yup."/pause 500/stopMusic/pause 3500/emote Sterling 40/speak Sterling "So, uh, chickens, am I right?$13"/pause 1000/emote Sterling 28/pause 1000/speak Shane "*Sigh*$5#$b#...Fine.$2#$b#Listen.$3#$b#After... everything happened, I had a long talk with Marnie."/pause 500/speak Shane "And we agreed things needed to change.$3#$b# Joja hasn't been great for my mental health and I just didn't have anything left for Jas after working 40 hour weeks there. $2#$b#So I'm working three days a week at Joja now, and two at the shop instead of paying rent."/pause 500/speak Sterling "That's... really good to hear.#$b#You deserve to be happy, Shane."/pause 900/speak Shane "I keep hearing that."/pause 2500/textAboveHead Shane true "I-"/textAboveHead Sterling "So-"/pause 500/speak Sterling "Sorry, go ahead."/speak Shane "I probably owe you an apology.#$b# I, uh... gave you some pretty bad advice.$2#$b#  And it hurt you and people we both care about.  $5#$b#I'm sorry.$3"/speak Sterling "Hey, you made it to step eight, nice.$13"/speak Shane "...$3#$b# Glad it's a joke to you.$2"/pause 500/speak Sterling "Listen step ten is learning to laugh where you could cry instead.$10"/pause 500/speak Shane "No it's not.$5"/pause 200/faceDirection Shane 1/pause 500/textAboveHead Shane "... is it?..."/faceDirection Shane 2/pause 500/speak Sterling "No it's not.$9#$b#But--"/pause 500/emote Sterling 40/pause 500/speak Sterling "Listen, what I really mean to say is -- Whatever happened, I already forgave you.#$b#I'm just still working on the whole 'vulnerability' thing with everyone.$4"/pause 500/speak Sterling "But the matter of fact is - I was just as bad for you as you were to me, you know?$11#$b#You forced those pills into my hand as much as I ever held you at gun point and made you drink.$6#$b#I could've been a friend to you. A proper one.#$b#...$12#$b#But I failed you too.$11#$b#I'm sorry, Shane.$11#$b#For being a bad influence. For acting like an enabler.$5#$b#For everything that happened.$11"/pause 500/emote Shane 40/pause 800/playSound purchase /playSound purchase/speak Shane "Alright, you're all set."/speak Sterling "...Thanks.$11"/move Sterling 0 1 1/move Sterling 0 1 2/speak Shane "...Hey. $3"/faceDirection Sterling 0/speak Shane "I'm glad you're doing better.#$b#Maybe I'll see you around sometime."/pause 500/speak Sterling "Yeah, you too.#$b#Sometime."/faceDirection Sterling 2/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopMusic/end
